title: Rules and regulations for the information and guidance of the principal officers and others in His Majesty's colonial possessions
imprint: Printed by W. Clowes and Sons
note: Desc v 1 = xii, 147 p. ; 25 cm / Preface signed and dated: Colonial Department, Downing Street, March 30th, 1837 / Possibly see BH Civ Serv Assn, *Rules* [sl, HM Prison, 1890s] OCLC Link: http://gw.worldcat.org.proxygw.wrlc.org/oclc/656504358 / Further see *Regulations for the guidance of public officers in the conduct of their official work and correspondence* [Belize, Angelus Press, 1897] OCLC Link: http://gw.worldcat.org.proxygw.wrlc.org/oclc/656507423
